verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> that there <S%G1831>went<s%> out a <S%G1378>decree<s%> from <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> Augustus <S%G828><s%>that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> should be <S%G582>taxed.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to be <S%G582>taxed,<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

And <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> to the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem;<s%> <S%G1223>(because<s%> he was of the <S%G3624>house<s%> and <S%G3965>lineage<s%> of <S%G1138>David:<s%>)
To be <S%G582>taxed<s%> with <S%G3137>Mary<s%> his <S%G3423>espoused<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> great with <S%G1471>child.<s%>
And so it was, that, while they were <S%G1563>there,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished<s%> that she should be <S%G5088>delivered.<s%>

And she <S%G5088>brought<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> her <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> and <S%G4683>wrapped<s%> him in <S%G4683>swaddling<s%> <S%G4683>clothes,<s%> and <S%G347>laid<s%> him in a <S%G5336>manger;<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> there was <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>room<s%> for them in the <S%G2646>inn.<s%>

But <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G4933>kept<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>things,<s%> and <S%G4820>pondered<s%> them in her <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

For <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> have <S%G1492>seen<s%> your <S%G4992>salvation,<s%>

<S%G1161>(Yes,<s%> a <S%G4501>sword<s%> shall <S%G1330>pierce<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> your own <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%>) that the <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> may be <S%G601>revealed.<s%>

And when they had <S%G5048>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G2250>days,<s%> as they <S%G5290>returned,<s%> the <S%G3816>child<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5278>tarried<s%> <S%G5278>behind<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%> and <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> not of it.

But they, <S%G3543>supposing<s%> him to have <S%G1511>been<s%> in the <S%G4923>company,<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> a <S%G2250>day's<s%> <S%G3598>journey;<s%> and they <S%G327>sought<s%> him <S%G1722>among<s%> their <S%G4773>kinsfolk<s%> and <S%G1110>acquaintance.<s%>
And when they <S%G2147>found<s%> him not, they <S%G5290>turned<s%> <S%G5290>back<s%> <S%G5290>again<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> him.

And when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, they were <S%G1605>amazed:<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5043>Son,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> have you <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G4160>dealt<s%> with us? <S%G2400>behold,<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and I have <S%G2212>sought<s%> you <S%G3600>sorrowing.<s%>

And they <S%G4920>understood<s%> not the <S%G4487>saying<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them.
